title: Out of Breadth: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 28, 2025

title: Upbit says emergency audit of $30M hack uncovered internal wallet flaw that could let attackers derive private keys
contentSnippet: Upbit said it discovered a vulnerability that could have allowed attackers to infer private keys from onchain wallet data.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Bitcoin Rebounds, but Downtrend Still Looms
contentSnippet: Bitcoin crept back toward $92,000 as markets slowly recovered from last week’s heavy sell-off, but mounting resistance threatens to keep the broader downtrend intact.

title: BlackRock’s Own Income Fund Boosts Bitcoin ETF Holdings 14%
contentSnippet: Strategic Income Opportunities Portfolio expands its allocation to the iShares Bitcoin Trust amid rising institutional demand.

title: Trump White House ‘World’s Most Corrupt Crypto Startup Operation’: House Democrats
contentSnippet: President Trump and his family made $800 million from sales of cryptocurrencies in the first half of the year, according to a new report.

title: Crypto Exchange KuCoin's European Arm Wins MiCA License in Austria
contentSnippet: KuCoin EU obtained a Markets in Crypto Assets (MiCA) regulation license in Austria, allowing it to offer regulated services across the EEA.

title: Upbit Reveals 5.9B-Won Corporate Loss in Latest Hack, Fully Reimburses Users
contentSnippet: Upbit said it reimbursed all 38.6 billion won in member assets from its reserves.

title: Animoca Brands to focus on stablecoin, RWA in 2026 amid US IPO efforts
contentSnippet: Animoca is planning to go public on the Nasdaq next year through a reverse-merger with Singapore-based Currenc Group.

title: Balancer plans to distribute $8 million in recovered funds from $128 million exploit
contentSnippet: Six white hat actors recovered $3.86 million during the attack, but some declined to receive bounties as they do not want to be identified.

title: South Korean Police Officers Indicted in $186 Million Crypto-Laundering Case
contentSnippet: The two officers have been stripped of their positions following their arrest in connection with the crypto money-laundering scheme.

title: Balancer Outlines Reimbursement Plan Following $128M Exploit
contentSnippet: Balancer has identified six whitehat actors who recovered approximately $3.9 million across multiple networks during the exploit.

title: Bitcoin and S&P 500 Year-End Bull Run Loading? Vol Metrics Say Yes
contentSnippet: Implied volatility indices tied to bitcoin and the S&P 500 have erased the recent spike, offering bullish price signals.

title: Cryptos Steady as BTC Hits Key Fib Level, Traders See Room for $100K but Little Beyond
contentSnippet: Traders have quickly re-priced the macro backdrop as the probability of a 25 bps cut at the upcoming FOMC meeting has surged from 39% to almost 87% in a matter of days.

title: BitMine buys $44 million worth of Ethereum as Tom Lee gives bullish outlook
contentSnippet: BitMine Chair Tom Lee said Ethereum could possibly trade between $7,000 and $9,000 by the end of January 2026.

title: South Korea Suspects North Korea-Linked Lazarus Behind $36M Upbit Hack
contentSnippet: On Thursday, South Korea's largest digital asset exchange, Upbit, suspended deposits and withdrawals after detecting unusual activity in the Solana network tokens.

title: Monad Token Extends Slide Amid Profit-Taking, Spoofed Transaction Concerns
contentSnippet: Monad’s token slipped on Thursday as possible profit-taking and a recent spoofing issue pressured prices despite brisk on-chain activity.

title: Solana Traders Hit by Months-Long Browser Malware That Skimmed Every Swap
contentSnippet: Wallet interfaces typically summarize instructions as a single swap, and the bundled transaction executes atomically—meaning users unknowingly sign off on both.

title: Upbit Hack Attributed to North Korea's Lazarus as Seoul Opens Probe: Report
contentSnippet: The breach has prompted a formal review of Upbit’s systems as regulators examine the Solana hot-wallet theft.

title: DOGE Underperforms Majors as Support Failure Confirms Bearish Shift
contentSnippet: The $0.150 level is now a critical support point, with further declines likely if it is breached.

title: North Korea’s Lazarus Group suspected in $30 million Upbit hack: report
contentSnippet: Upbit initially reported a loss of 54 billion won ($36.8 million) but later revised the figure down to 44.5 billion won ($30.4 million).

title: Do Kwon requests 5-year prison term cap in $40 billion Terra fraud case
contentSnippet: In August, Kwon pleaded guilty to fraud charges stemming from the May 2022 collapse of Terraform Labs' Terra ecosystem.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: MegaETH to return all funds from pre-deposit bridge, citing ‘sloppy’ execution
contentSnippet: Tuesday's pre-deposit event faced outages, changes in deposit cap, and a misconfigured multisig transaction.

title: Interpol Elevates Scam-Compound Network to Global Threat as Crypto Fraud Spreads
contentSnippet: The aim is to confront global scam center systems that traffic workers, run large-scale online fraud, and channel billions through crypto.

title: Malware Chrome Extension Secretly Siphoned Fees From Solana Traders for Months
contentSnippet: Cybersecurity firm Socket warns the extension masks a second transaction instruction that quietly skims SOL from routine swaps.

title: Vitalik Buterin Donates $765K in Ethereum to Privacy Messaging Apps
contentSnippet: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin supported two privacy messaging apps that are looking to break past sector leaders Signal and Telegram.

title: US AI and Data Firms to Testify in Chinese AI Espionage Probe
contentSnippet: The U.S. is probing how Chinese operators used AI in a cyber-espionage campaign as experts warn similar tools could hit on-chain finance.

title: Kalshi doubles valuation in weeks amid prediction market duopoly bet with Polymarket
contentSnippet: Prediction markets have quickly become one of the hottest private market themes in crypto and fintech, echoing earlier cycles.

title: The Daily: Upbit suffers $37 million hack, SpaceX moves over $100 million in bitcoin, Infinex plans token sale on Sonar, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2025
contentSnippet: At a loss for what to buy the crypto fan in your life this festive season? Look no further than Decrypt’s holiday gift guide.

title: Inside Infinex: Kain Warwick on building a ‘superapp’ to solve crypto’s UX problems
contentSnippet: Infinex founder Kain Warwick joined The Big Brain Podcast to discuss tackling crypto's UX problems, fundraising, Crypto Twitter dynamics, and building a "superapp."

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.

title: Fear returns to the crypto market as $230B vanishes overnight
contentSnippet: Investor sentiment turned sharply bearish as crypto’s fear index plunged to 28, and $230 billion in value evaporated in a single day.
